history.text: Did you enjoy the movie Frozen?
Believe it or not, I've actually never sat through it! My daughter has watched it a few times with me in the room but I have never taken the time to sit and enjoy it. Did you enjoy it?
Yes, I watched with with my daughter and I think I really enjoyed just watching her enjoy it.
Did your daughter tell you what the movie was about?

I really should sit and watch it. I feel like I've missed something by not seeing it. Yes she has told me what it's about. I don't remember too much but I think it's a cute story. Have you ever heard of the original Hans Christian Andersen story?
they save their country from a bitter cold season - which we all can relate to.
Yes, we can relate. I didn't realize the lyricist, Howard Ashman died.

Wow I didn't know that either.  The songs became very familiar to little people singing them all over the place
.
Yeah, I couldn't get away from it! Haha! I like how the female characters are strong. That's a good thing for our daughters to see.
Elsa was kind of like the villian but she was just confused which many little people can be.
I love a disney movie with a lesson learned

so strategies is the next topic - 
The movie was rated high
Me too! I learned so many lessons from Disney as a kid!
Do you generally watch movies with good or bad ratings?
Yes it was rated high. It had a lot of hype as most Disney movies do. I have weird taste so I don't look at rating but more at subject matter.
Interesting - I guess sometimes the movie critics are not always right.
I wonder how you could see Frozen today since you haven't seen it yet.  I wonder if Netflix has it.
It just depends on personal taste I guess. I generally love the Disney animated movies though. I wish I watched Frozen so I could be in the loop!
It is probably on there, I have to check. If not, I can probably rent it
My daughter would be thrilled to have me watch it with her
I am not much of a dvd renter - I am totally into netflix and movies like Frozen.
Mine too - she would love to watch it again.
looks like we have to continue to talk about the theme
I rarely rent because I'm cheap so If Frozen is on Netflix or other streaming services I am on, then I'll definitely watch. If not, I tend to procrastinate!
I like Kristin Bell, shes
she's funny
I didn't realize it was 3D
Yes.  Looks like the document changed and we need to talk about more info.  I didn't realize it was 3D either. But I am not much of a 3D person -
Neither am I
I took my son (3years old) to one and he took his glasses off the whole time.
haha that's something I would do!
Wow the doc shows that the singers were actually young girls
To be that young and to be that talented.
yeah, I can't imagine how much determination they needed to have! Very talented!
I didn't realize there were trolls in the movie
sometimes putting a young person under that type of pressure is not a good thing
I absolutely agree
I actually don't remember trolls
I guess they are Kristoff's adoptive family?
Probably.  The character that stands out besides the girls is the snowman (Olfie) or something like that. You see the snowman figure everywhere
I think it's funny to name a giant snow creature "marshmallow"!
Yeah I've seen him before
He was the comic in the film with a bunch of line liners
one liners
His character seemed really cute
It's crazy it came out in 2013!
seems like last year!
I know - it seems like yesterday
5 years ago
Tme flies
Indeed
Reading all this info on the movie makes me want to see it more that ever. Such a sweet sounding story.
So in the end their kingdom survives - we love happy endings.
Thank goodness. You never know with Disney films. Theres always a lesson to be learned though.
I had never heard of Idina Menzel before. She does the voice of Elsa
I didn't know who they were either.  Yes, years pass and you can always count of Disney.
cartoon characters and real people's voices don't mix
Unless they have a very distinct voice
Very true
I always remember the funny characters like Olaf and there was a funny moose or reindeer in the the film too.
I didn't realize Disney had had only 53 animated features at this point! Seems like they had so much more!
Seriously - that seems low.  I wonder if Disney world as a Frozen section
I love the animal characters. Disney does really well with those. You could tell they were a big hit in this movei.
I have no idea. Probably.
Well thank goodness we have Disney films like Frozen in the this high tech world of craziness.
I agree.
I wonder if the movie closely follows the original story?
Not sure - would have to google that one.  All those kids who play their parts in Frozen are probably adults or close to it and are set for life - Frozen will live on and on.
That
that is true
based on the classic 1844 Hans Christian Andersen fairytale The Snow Queen
Dang that an old fairytale
Well the story has endured. They don't write stories and fairytales like that anymore!
I bet Disney made the screen play softer than The Snow Queen
most definitely. It's always like that with Disney. They make it sweeter for the kids
Sometimes these fairy tales and movies can be scary for kids.
I wonder if Arendele is a real place?
I agree
Probably fictional

How do we finish this conversation? does it close
 on it's own?
Not a clue
yes most likely. With aspects of reality
me neither
looks like a finish tab to the right.
shall we hit it
I'll hit it. Nice talking to you!
later

uid2response.feedback: This was an interesting survey. I wasn't sure when it was ok to actually leave the conversation.
